com.cmput301f20t13.treatyourshelf.ui.UserProfile

Class ProfileRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301f20t13.treatyourshelf.ui.UserProfile.ProfileRepository

  • public class ProfileRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for parsing the "users" collection in Firestore and all operations associated.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addProfile(Profile profile)
      Adds a new profile to the "users" collection in the repository.
      static ProfileLiveData getProfileByEmailLiveData(java.lang.String email)
      Returns LiveData based on a query given an email.
      static ProfileLiveData getProfileByUsernameLiveData(java.lang.String username)
      Returns LiveData based on a query given a username.
      static void updateInformationByEmail(java.lang.String email, Profile profile)
      Updates the information in the repository given the email and the profile to set the new data to.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getProfileByUsernameLiveData

        public static ProfileLiveData getProfileByUsernameLiveData(java.lang.String username)
        Returns LiveData based on a query given a username. Usernames are unique and thus only one ProfileLiveData is returned.
        Parameters:
        username - The unique username.
        Returns:
        The LiveData given the result of the query for the Firestore.

      • getProfileByEmailLiveData

        public static ProfileLiveData getProfileByEmailLiveData(java.lang.String email)
        Returns LiveData based on a query given an email. Emails are unique and thus only one ProfileLiveData is returned.
        Parameters:
        email - The unique email.
        Returns:
        The LiveData given the result of the query for the Firestore.

      • updateInformationByEmail

        public static void updateInformationByEmail(java.lang.String email,
                                            Profile profile)
        Updates the information in the repository given the email and the profile to set the new data to.
        Parameters:
        email - The email for which to update the information for. Unique.
        profile - The new profile data for which to update the repository.

      • addProfile

        public static void addProfile(Profile profile)
        Adds a new profile to the "users" collection in the repository.
        Parameters:
        profile - The profile object for which to add to the Firestore repository.
